Apply formatting function that supports sheet and dims argument to one or more sheets

Source: R/wb_sheets_fmt.R
wb_sheets_fmt.Rd

wb_sheets_fmt() applies a formatting function to one or more sheets and columns. sheets is recycled to match the length of dims. dims can be set based on cols and sheets or set directly.

Usage

wb_sheets_fmt(
  wb,
  .f = openxlsx2::wb_add_numfmt,
  cols = NULL,
  sheets = NULL,
  dims = NULL,
  ...
)

Arguments

.f

Formatting function to apply to workbook.

cols

A character vector or list of character vectors. Length of cols is recycled to match length of sheets.

sheets

Default to use all workbook sheets.
